Module example.sixdoku
Package example.sixdoku.models

Class Sudoku

java.lang.Object
example.sixdoku.models.Sudoku
public class Sudoku extends Object
Model that represents the 6x6 Sudoku game Contains all game logic

      Fill the Sudoku puzzle with a valid solution
      Parameters:
      index - actual position in the array
      Returns:
      true if sudoku puzzle was completed and false if a cell could not be filled
